entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 60 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Showers beginning overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Amount 5 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming east 20 late this evening. Low 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Showers at times heavy. High 13.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind becoming southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 in the morning. High 13. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 60%
